data.prayer: Father, convict the 19,377 believers in Prey Vêng to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Prey Vêng, Cambodia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Prey Vêng, Cambodia with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Prey Vêng words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Prey Vêng, Cambodia that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Father, 1.6% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
God, we pray for the believers in Prey Vêng, Cambodia that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Prey Vêng to agree with you and with one another.

data.section_summary:
the state of Prey Vêng, Cambodia has a population of 947,400.

We estimate Prey Vêng has 19,377 people who might know Jesus, 13,156 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 914,868 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 48 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Prey Vêng, Cambodia. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.
